heroSection.heading: Be prepared for upcoming reanimations
heroSection.subheading: Stay safe and sound on Z-Day
heroSection.description: Learn how to survive and thrive during a zombie apocalypse with our essential tips and resources.

items.title: Gather Supplies
items.body: Stock up on water, food, and first aid supplies. Ensure you have enough to last several days without access to additional resources.

items.title: Secure Your Home
items.body: Ensure your living space is fortified against the reanimated. Check all entries and exits, and reinforce doors and windows.

items.title: Form a Plan
items.body: Plan your evacuation and safety measures with family. Identify local shelters and multiple escape routes from your area.

items.title: Stay Informed
items.body: Keep up-to-date with the latest zombie alerts and safety tips. Follow local news and emergency broadcasts regularly.

finalSection.heading: Act Now Before It's Too Late!
content: How prepared are you for a reanimation event? According to a 2019 study by YouGov, **86% of Americans reported not having a plan for what they would do in the event of a zombie outbreak.** [Source](https://d3nkl3psvxxpe9.cloudfront.net/documents/Zombie-Plans-Data.pdf)

Don't wait for the zombie apocalypse to catch you off guard. Prepare today and ensure your safety and survival. Connect with local zombie preparedness organizations and participate in community drills.
